document.discussion_title: Grain Prices Illinois River Barge Points
document.topic_text: GX_GR112 Springfield, IL Wed, Aug 10, 2016 USDA-IL Dept of Ag Market News Illinois River Barge Terminals Producer Bids/Basis Bids ($/bu) Change (�/bu) Basis Change Cash Price South of Peoria Corn 3.1850-3.2250 DN 2.75 -4U to OptU DN 3 Soybeans 10.2125-10.2225 DN 5.75-DN 11.75 39X to 40X UNCH-DN 6 Wheat 3.7675-3.7975 UP 6.75-UP 7.75 -45U to -42U UP 2-UP 3 Contract Bids for OCT/NOV 2016 Delivery Corn 3.1100-3.1700 DN 0.5-UP 0.5 -22Z to -16Z DN 1-UNCH Soybeans 9.6725-9.7425 DN 5.75-DN 9.75 -15X to -8X UNCH-DN 4 * Wheat NA NA NA NA Cash Price North of Peoria Corn 3.1550-3.1750 DN 5.75 -7U to -5U DN 6 Soybeans 10.1825-10.1925 DN 4.75-DN 6.75 36X to 37X UP 1-DN 1 Wheat NA NA NA NA Contract Bids for OCT/NOV 2016 Delivery Corn 3.0800-3.1000 UP 0.5 -25Z to -23Z UNCH Soybeans 9.6525-9.6725 DN 5.75 -17X to -15X UNCH * Wheat NA NA NA NA * Wheat bids for June/July 2017 delivery K May, M June, N July, Q August, U September, V October, X November, Z December Source: USDA-IL Dept of Ag Market News Service, Springfield, IL David Humphreys 217-782-4925 SpringField.LPGMN@ams.usda.gov In state only toll free 888-458-4787 www.ams.usda.gov/mnreports/gx_gr112.txt www.ams.usda.gov/LPSMarketNewsPage 1612C dh
